input.sentences: the band getting ready for the school concert .
the whole band tuning up during rehearsal .
everyone filing in for the big school concert .
standing ovation after the big performance .
all the guys stayed behind to help put the chairs away .
output.sentences: The school was getting ready for the concert.
The school band had a rehearsal and tuned their instruments.
The school started filling up for the concert.
The band's performance was amazing and received a standing ovation.
Afterwards, some guys stayed and helped put chairs and equipment away.
